"1T1h1e1 1c1h1i1l1d1r1e1n1 1n1o1w1 1l1o1v1e1 1l1u1x1u1r1y1;1 1t1h1e1y1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1a1d1 1m1a1n2e1r1s1,1 1c1o1n1t1e1m1p1t1 1f1o1r1 1a1u1t1h1o1r1i1t1y1;1 1t1h1e1y1 1s1h1o1w1 1d1i1s1r1e1s1p1e1c1t1 1f1o1r1 1e1l1d1e1r1s1 1a1n1d1 1l1o1v1e1 1c1h1a1t2e1r1 1i1n1 1p1l1a1c1e1 1o1f1 1e1x1e1r1c1i1s1e1.1 1C1h1i1l1d1r1e1n1 1a1r1e1 1n1o1w1 1t1y1r1a1n1t1s1,1 1n1o1t1 1t1h1e1 1s1e1r1v1a1n1t1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1h1o1u1s1e1h1o1l1d1s1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1n1o1 1l1o1n1g1e1r1 1r1i1s1e1 1w1h1e1n1 1e1l1d1e1r1s1 1e1n1t1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1r1o2m1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1c1o1n1t1r1a1d1i1c1t1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1p1a1r1e1n1t1s1,1 1c1h1a1t2e1r1 1b1e1f1o1r1e1 1c1o1m1p1a1n1y1,1 1g1o1b2l1e1 1u1p1 1d1a1i1n1t1i1e1s1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1t1a1b1l1e1,1 1c1r1o1s2 1t1h1e1i1r1 1l1e1g1s1,1 1a1n1d1 1t1y1r1a1n2i1z1e1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1t1e1a1c1h1e1r1s1.1"1 1(1S1o1c1r1a1t1e1s1.1)1
2T1h1e1 1p1e1r1e1n2i1a1l1 1"1h1o1s1t1i1l1i1t1y1"1

2F1r1o1m1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1b1o1l1d1 1t1o1p1i1c1a1l1 1h1e1a1d1l1i1n1e1 1t1o1 1i1n1f1l1u1e1n1t1i1a1l1 1f1i1g1u1r1e1s1'1 1s1t1a1t1e1m1e1n1t1,1 1"1o1u1r1 1m1o1d1e1r1n1 1p1r1o1g1e1n1y1 1a1r1e1.3"1 1h1a1s1 1a1l2 1t1o2 1o1f1t1e1n1 1s1i1g1n1a1l2e1d1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1m1a1n1i1f1e1s1t1a1t1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1b1e1l1i1t2l1i1n1g1 1c1r1i1t1i1c1i1s1m1 1f1o1l2o1w1i1n1g1 1a1f1t1e1r1w1a1r1d1s1.1 1A1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1i1t1 1s1e2m1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1s1u1p1e1r1f1i1c1i1a1l1i1t1y1,1 1a1p1a1t1h1y1,1 1i1n1s1o1l1e1n1c1y1,1 1o1v1e1r1-1i1n1d1u1l1g1e1n1c1e1,1 1l1o1a1t1h1f1u1l1 1f1a1s1h1i1o1n1,1 1a1l1o2f1n1e1s2 1t1o1 1r1e1a1d1i1n1g1 1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1s1p1l1u1r1g1e1s1 1a1l2-1t1o2-1t1i1e1d1-1u1p1 1t1o1 1"1t1h1e1 1m1o1d1e1r1n1 1p1r1o1g1e1n1y1"1 1w1a1s1 1a1l1s1o1 1t1a1g2e1d1 1o1n1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1"1p1r1o1g1e1n1y1"1 1p1r1i1o1r1 1t1o1 1o1u1r1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1.1 1T1o1 1a1l2 1a1p2e1a1r1a1n1c1e1s1,1 1i1s1 1y1o1u1t1h1,1 1a1u1d1a1c1i1t1y1 1a1n1d1 1e1x1p1e1r1i1e1n1c1e1 1d1e1a1r1t1h1 1i1n1d1e2d1 1t1h1e1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1-1h1a1v1e1-1b1e2n1-1n1a1g2e1d1-1a1t1 1s1i1t2i1n1g1 1d1u1c1k1s1?1

2T1h1e1 1c1r1i1t1i1c1i1s1m1 1c1y1c1l1e1

2T1o1 1e1v1i1d1e1n1c1e1 1w1h1i1c1h1,1 1h1e1 1t1u1r1n1e1d1 1d1e1v1e1l1o1p1m1e1n1t1a1l1 1p1s1y1c1h1o1l1o1g1i1s1t1 1e1x1p1e1r1t1s1 1-1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1h1o1l1d1i1n1g1 1p1r1o1f1u1n1d1i1t1y1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1j1u1v1e1n1i1l1e1'1s1 1p1s1y1c1h1o1l1o1g1i1c1a1l1,1 1e1m1o1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1a1n1d1 1c1o1g1n1i1t1i1v1e1 1c1h1a1n1g1e1s1 1a1s1 1e1a1c1h1 1i1n1d1i1v1i1d1u1a1l1 1w1o1r1k1e1d1 1h1i1s1 1w1a1y1 1u1p1 1i1n1 1l1i1f1e1.1 1G1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1e1 1r1e1n1o1w1n1e1d1 1m1a1r1s1h1m1a1l2o1w1 1e1x1p1e1r1i1m1e1n1t1;1 1P1r1o1t1z1k1o1 1g1o1t1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1e1x1p1e1r1t1s1 1t1o1 1a1n1t1i1c1i1p1a1t1e1 1w1h1e1t1h1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1y1o1u1n1g1 1b1a1c1k1 1t1h1e1n1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1o1u1t1p1e1r1f1o1r1m1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1p1r1e1d1e1c1e1s2o1r1s1 1i1n1 1q1u1e1l2i1n1g1 1t1e1m1p1o1r1a1r1y1 1s1e1d1u1c1t1i1o1n1.1
2O1n1 1t1h1e1 1w1h1o1l1e1,1 1%1 1o1f1 1w1h1o1m1 1c1l1a1i1m1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1c1h1i1l1d1r1e1n1 1m1u1s1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1g1o1t1 1d1o1w1n1g1r1a1d1e1d1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1a1b1i1l1i1t1y1,1 1w1h1i1l1s1t1 1t1h1e1 1r1e1s1t1 1%1 1d1i1d1 1g1o1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1 1o1p2o1s1i1t1e1 1a1n1t1i1c1i1p1a1t1i1o1n1.1 1S1t1r1i1k1i1n1g1l1y1 1e1n1o1u1g1h1,1 1f1i1e1l1d1 1e1x1p1e1r1i1m1e1n1t1s1,1 1h1o1w1e1v1e1r1,1 1w1e1n1t1 1v1i1o1l1e1n1t1l1y1 1a1g1a1i1n1s1t1 1t1h1e1 1b1i1a1s1,1 1e1v1i1d1e1n1c1i1n1g1 1t1h1a1t1 1"1p1r1o1g1e1n1i1e1s1"1 1d1i1d1 1o1u1t1r1u1n1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1g1r1a1n1d1p1a1r1e1n1t1s1,1 1w1h1o1 1w1e1r1e1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1a1g1e1s1 1h1a1l1f1 1a1 1c1e1n1t1u1r1y1 1a1g1o1.1 1T1h1i1s1,1 1a1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1s1p1e1l1t1 1o1u1t1 1t1h1e1 1w1o1e1f1u1l1 1f1a1c1t1 1t1h1a1t1 1e1v1e1n1 1e1x1p1e1r1t1s1 1f1a1i1l1e1d1 1t1o1 1a1n1t1i1c1i1p1a1t1e1 1t1h1e1 1y1o1u1n1g1'1s1 1a1c1t1u1a1l1 1p1e1r1f1o1r1m1a1n1c1e1.1
2N1e1v1e1r1t1h1e1l1e1s2,1 1i1n1 1a1n1o1t1h1e1r1 1s1t1u1d1y1,1 1P1r1o1t1z1k1o1 1a1n1d1 1h1i1s1 1c1o1l2e1a1g1u1e1s1 1u1n1v1e1i1l1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1r1e1a1s1o1n1s1 1b1e1h1i1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1p1h1e1n1o1m1e1n1o1n1:1 1a1s1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1i1n1d1i1v1i1d1u1a1l1 1t1i1l1t1e1d1 1t1o1w1a1r1d1s1 1n1i1t1p1i1c1k1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1p1r1o1g1e1n1y1'1s1 1c1o1n1s1t1r1a1i1n1t1s1,1 1[1w1h1i1c1h1,1 1h1o1w1e1v1e1r1,1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1p1o1l1i1s1h1e1d1 1u1p1 1a1s1 1o1n1e1 1w1o1r1k1s1 1h1i1s1 1o1w1n1 1w1a1y1 1u1p1]1,1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1m1e1m1o1r1y1 1b1i1a1s1 1w1o1u1l1d1,1 1t1h1e1r1e1u1p1o1n1,1 1l1a1y1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1o1n1 1t1h1i1c1k1 1a1n1d1 1c1o1m1p1a1r1e1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1y1o1u1n1g1 1v1e1r1s1i1o1n1s1,1 1t1h1u1s1 1r1e1v1i1d1i1f1y1i1n1g1 1a1 1"1s1u1b1l1i1m1e1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1"1.1 1W1i1e1l1d1i1n1g1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1 1s1c1o1p1e1 1t1o1 1m1o1d1e1r1n1 1y1o1u1n1g1s1t1e1r1s1,1 1a1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1m1u1s1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1s1p1e1a1r1h1e1a1d1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1f1e2l1i1n1g1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1"1f1r1a1i1l1 1j1u1v1e1n1i1l1e1s1"1 1w1e1r1e1 1t1a1k1i1n1g1 1d1o1w1n1 1a1 1p1e1g1.1
2T1o1 1p1u1t1 1i1n1t1o1 1p1e1r1s1p1e1c1t1i1v1e1,1 1t1h1e1 1e1x1p1e1r1i1m1e1n1t1 1d1i1d1 1r1e1p1o1r1t1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1n1o1r1m1a1t1i1v1e1 1w1e1r1e1 1i1n1c1l1i1n1e1d1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1e1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1i1o1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1y1o1u1n1g1 1h1a1d1 1p1a1i1d1,1 1i1f1 1a1n1y1,1 1l1i1t2l1e1 1r1e1s1p1e1c1t1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1p1r1e1d1e1c1e1s2o1r1s1;1 1w1h1i1l1s1t1 1v1o1r1a1c1i1o1u1s1 1r1e1a1d1e1r1s1 1p1u1r1p1o1r1t1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1w1o1r1d1s1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1v1e1 1n1o1 1l1o1n1g1e1r1 1a1p2e1a1l1e1d1 1t1o1 1j1u1v1e1n1i1l1e1s1;1 1f1o1r1a1s1m1u1c1h1 1t1h1e1 1h1i1g1h1 1a1c1h1i1e1v1e1r1s1 1i1n1 1s1o1m1e1 1f1o1r1m1e1r1 1s1h1o1r1t1 1I1Q1 1t1e1s1t1s1 1p1r1e1s1u1m1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1p1r1e1g1o1n1y1 1m1u1s1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1l1e1s2 1i1n1t1e1l2e1c1t1u1a1l2y1 1p1r1o1m1i1n1e1n1t1.1
2I1n1 1a1 1h1i1g1h1 1a1t2e1m1p1t1 1t1o1 1d1e1b1u1n1k1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1m1y1t1h1s1,1 1t1h1e1 1p1s1y1c1h1o1l1o1g1i1s1t1 1a1r1g1u1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1a1s1 1i1n1d1i1v1i1d1u1a1l1s1,1 1t1h1e1y1 1h1a1d1 1w1o1e1f1u1l2y1 1l1a1c1k1e1d1 1o1b1j1e1c1t1i1v1e1 1e1v1i1d1e1n1c1e1,1 1t1o1 1d1e1m1o1n1s1t1r1a1t1e1,1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1y1o1u1n1g1'1s1 1r1e1a1d1i1n1g1 1p1a1t2e1r1n1s1,1 1i1n1 1a1c2o1r1d1a1n1c1e1 1w1i1t1h1 1t1h1e1i1r1s1.1 1T1h1e1 1o1n1l1y1 1d1a1t1a1 1t1h1e1y1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1e1v1e1r1 1t1u1r1n1 1t1o1 1w1a1s1 1p1e1r1s1o1n1a1l1 1m1e1m1o1r1i1e1s1 1a1n1d1 1e1x1p1e1r1i1e1n1c1e1s1 1-1 1w1h1i1c1h1,1 1g1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1i1n1h1e1r1e1n1t1 1p1r1e1s1e1n1t1i1s1m1 1b1i1a1s1,1 1d1i1d1 1m1o1r1p1h1 1i1n1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1n1o1r1m1s1 1[1o1n1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1t1h1e1y1 1j1u1d1g1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1s1]1.1 1W1o1r1s1e1 1s1t1i1l2,1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1c1o1m2e1n1t1s1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1t1u1r1n1 1o1u1t1 1s1o1m1e1w1h1a1t1 1h1y1p1e1r1c1r1i1t1i1c1a1l1,1 1w1e1r1e1 1t1h1e1 1s1e1n1i1o1r1s1 1t1o1 1"1l1e1c1t1u1r1e1"1 1w1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1y1 1s1e2m1 1u1n1r1i1v1a1l2e1d1 1a1t1.1
2T1o1 1b1e1a1r1 1o1u1t1 1w1h1i1c1h1,1 1t1h1e1 1r1e1s1e1a1r1c1h1e1r1s1 1s1e1t1 1u1p1 1a1n1 1e1x1p1e1r1i1m1e1n1t1 1t1o1 1s1i1z1e1 1u1p1 1t1h1e1 1n1u1m1b1e1r1 1o1f1 1t1e1x1t1s1 1t1h1e1 1p1a1r1t1i1c1i1p1a1n1t1s1 1h1a1d1 1d1i1g1e1s1t1e1d1.1 1T1h1e1y1 1d1e1l1i1b1e1r1a1t1e1l1y1 1g1a1v1e1 1f1a1l1s1i1f1i1a1b1l1e1 1e1v1a1l1u1a1t1i1o1n1,1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1"1s1t1r1u1c1k1"1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1
1"1p1r1e1d1e1c1e1s2o1r1s1"1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1r1e1a1d1i1n1g1 1p1a1t2e1r1n1s1 1w1e1r1e1 1h1a1r1d1l1y1 1"1i1n1s1u1r1m1o1u1n1t1a1b1l1e1"1.1 1T1h1e1s1e1 1s1u1b1j1e1c1t1s1,1 1t1h1u1s1,1 1u1n1s1u1r1p1r1i1s1i1n1g1l1y1 1a1r2i1v1e1d1 1a1t1 1l1e1s2 1b1e1l1i1t2l1i1n1g1 1c1o1m2e1n1t1s1,1 1f1o1r1a1s1m1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1e1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1i1o1n1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1j1u1v1e1n1i1l1e1s1'1 1i1l2-1f1a1v1o1r1e1d1 1r1e1a1d1i1n1g1 1h1a1b1i1t1s1 1d1i1d1 1a1s1 1w1e1l2 1d1i1e1 1a1w1a1y1.1 1I1n1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1w1o1r1d1s1,1 1h1a1d1 1t1h1e1 1a1d1u1l1t1s1 1b1e2n1 1h1e2d1f1u1l1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1y1 1h1a1d1 1b1e2n1 1a1s1 1"1l1e1t1h1a1r1g1i1c1"1,1 1t1h1e1 1p1r1e1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1i1o1n1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1i1n1s1t1e1a1d1 1p1r1o1j1e1c1t1e1d1 1i1n1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1m1e1m1o1r1i1e1s1 1w1h1e1r1e1i1n1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1p1r1e1g1o1n1i1e1s1 1"1m1u1s1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1a1s1 1d1i1f2i1d1e1n1t1"1.1
2P1r1o1t1z1k1o1,1 1a1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1s1t1r1e1s2e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1p1r1e1s1e1n1t1i1s1m1 1b1i1a1s1 1i1s1 1r1a1r1e1l1y1 1t1h1e1 1o1n1l1y1 1f1a1c1t1o1r1 1t1o1 1d1r1i1v1e1 1a1d1u1l1t1s1 1d1e1r1i1d1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1d1e1s1c1e1n1d1a1n1t1s1.1 1O1t1h1e1r1s1 1r1e1a1s1o1n1 1i1t1 1o1u1t1 1a1s1 1e1i1t1h1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1s1u1p1e1r1f1i1c1i1a1l1 1p1h1r1a1s1e1 1m1u1s1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1a1 1p1e1r1e1n2i1a1l1 1c1u1l1t1u1r1a1l1 1i1d1e1n1t1i1t1y1,1 1o1r1 1w1e1 1h1u1m1a1n1s1 1h1a1v1e1 1b1e2n1 1a1l2-1t1o2-1t1i1l1t1e1d1 1t1o1w1a1r1d1s1 1a1n1t1i1c1i1p1a1t1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1p1a1s1t1 1a1s1 1"1f1o1r1e1v1e1r1m1o1r1e1 1h1e1y1d1a1y1s1"1.1
2T1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1m1u1m1b1o1 1j1u1m1b1o1 1[1i1n1s1t1e1a1d1 1o1f1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1a1l1]1 1g1a1p1
2O1t1h1e1r1s1,1 1h1o1w1e1v1e1r1,1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1a1l1w1a1y1s1 1t1u1r1n1 1t1o1 1a1n1o1t1h1e1r1 1"1c1r1i1t1i1c1a1l1 1f1a1c1t1o1r1"1 1b1e1h1i1n1d1 1t1h1i1s1 1"1m1o1d1e1r1n1 1p1r1e1g1o1n1y1"1 1i1s2u1e1 1a1n1d1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1i1d1e1o1l1o1g1i1c1a1l1 1c1o1n1f1l1i1c1t1 1i1n1-1b1e1t1w1e2n1 1a1 1m1u1l1t1i1-1g1e1n1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1s1o1c1i1e1t1y1 1-1 1t1h1e1 1u1n1b1r1i1d1g1e1a1b1l1e1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1 1g1a1p1.1
2D1e1v1e1l1o1p1e1d1 1b1y1 1t1h1e1 1f1a1m1o1u1s1 1a1n1t1h1r1o1p1o1l1o1g1i1s1t1 1M1a1r1g1a1r1e1t1 1M1e1a1d1,1 1t1h1i1s1 1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1 1c1a1n1 1b1e1 1s1i1m1p1l1y1 1d1e1f1i1n1e1d1 1a1s1 1d1i1f2e1r1e1n1c1e1s1 1(1o1r1 1d1i1s1t1a1n1c1e1s1)1 1i1n1 1v1a1l1u1e1s1,1 1a1t2i1t1u1d1e1s1,1 1a1n1d1 1b1e1h1a1v1i1o1r1s1 1a1m1o1n1g1 1m1e1m1b1e1r1s1.1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1 1o1l1d1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1y1o1u1n1g1.1 1T1h1i1s1 1t1e1r1m1 1w1a1s1 1u1s1e1d1 1t1o1 1e1x1p1l1a1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1c1o1n1f1l1i1c1t1 1b1e1t1w1e2n1 1p1a1r1e1n1t1s1 1a1n1d1 1c1h1i1l1d1r1e1n1 1w1i1t1h1i1n1 1a1 1s1i1n1g1l1e1 1f1a1m1i1l1y1,1 1b1u1t1 1g1r1a1d1u1a1l2y1 1b1e1c1a1m1e1 1p1o1p1u1l1a1r1 1a1n1d1 1r1e1c1e1i1v1e1d1 1s1p1e1c1i1a1l1 1a1t2e1n1t1i1o1n1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1s1 1a1n1d1 1s1,1 1a1s1 1a1l2-1t1o2-1o1f1t1e1n1 1r1e1f1e1r2e1d1 1t1o1 1i1n1 1a1 1m1u1l1t1i1t1u1d1e1 1o1f1 1b1o2k1s1,1 1w1h1i1l1s1t1 1n1e1w1s1p1a1p1e1r1s1 1p1r1e1v1a1i1l1e1d1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1d1i1f2e1r1e1n1c1e1s1 1b1e1t1w1e2n1 1"1b1a1b1y1 1b1o2m1e1r1s1"1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1p1a1r1e1n1t1s1 1.1 1A1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1i1t1 1m1u1s1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1e1v1o1l1v1e1d1 1i1n1t1o1 1a1 1p1r1o1b1l1e1m1 1t1h1a1t1 1m1a1n1a1g1e1r1s1,1 1a1n1d1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1B1r1o1b1d1i1n1g1n1a1g1i1a1n1 1m1u1s1t1 1z1e1r1o1 1i1n1 1a1s1 1X1-1e1r1s1 1a1n1d1 1Y1-1e1r1s1 1b1e1g1i1n1 1s1n1e1a1k1i1n1g1 1u1p1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1w1o1r1k1f1o1r1c1e1.1
2I1n1 1f1a1c1t1,1 1t1h1i1s1 1s1o1-1c1a1l2e1d1 1"1g1a1p1"1 1m1u1s1t1 1o1r1i1g1i1n1a1t1e1 1f1r1o1m1 1t1h1e1 1o1r1a1l1 1p1o1p1 1c1u1l1t1u1r1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1t1h1a1n1 1a1n1y1 1s1c1i1e1n1t1i1f1i1c1 1t1h1e1o1r1e1t1i1c1a1l1 1s1y1s1t1e1m1.1 1E1i1t1h1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1"1s1i1l1e1n1t1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1"1,1 1"1b1a1b1y1 1b1o2m1e1r1s1"1,1 1G1e1n1 1X1 1o1r1 1G1e1n1 1Y1,1 1a1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1h1a1v1e1 1t1u1r1n1e1d1 1o1u1t1 1p1u1r1e1l1y1 1t1a1x1o1n1o1m1i1e1s1 1c1o1i1n1e1d1 1b1y1 1P1e1w1 1R1e1s1e1a1r1c1h1;1 1b1e1s1i1d1e1s1 1m1a1n1y1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1c1l1a1s2i1f1i1c1a1t1i1o1n1s1 1f1e1a1s1t1i1n1g1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1t1i1m1e1 1g1a1p1 1b1e1t1w1e2n1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1s1.1
2D1u1r1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1l1a1s1t1 1d1e1c1a1d1e1,1 1t1h1e1 1U1S1 1A1r1m1y1 1f1u1n1d1e1d1 1a1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1m1e1t1a1-1a1n1a1l1y1s1i1s1 1s1t1u1d1y1 1o1n1 1h1o1w1 1t1o1 1s1u1c1k1 1t1h1e1 1y1o1u1n1g1 1i1n1 1s1e1r1v1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1m1i1l1i1t1a1r1y1 1-1 1p1u1r1p1o1r1t1i1n1g1 1t1h1a1t1 1w1a1r1s1 1a1n1d1 1e1c1o1n1o1m1i1c1 1u1p1h1e1a1v1a1l1s1 1h1a1d1 1s1h1a1p1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1s1 1b1e1a1r1i1n1g1 1w1i1t1h1 1d1i1s1t1i1n1c1t1i1v1e1 1t1r1a1i1t1s1.1 1T1o1 1i1l2u1s1t1r1a1t1e1,1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1e1x1i1s1t1e1d1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1p1r1e1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1i1o1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1V1i1e1t1n1a1m1 1w1a1r1 1d1i1d1 1s1h1a1p1e1 1B1a1b1y1 1B1o2m1e1r1s1'1 1m1a1t1e1r1i1a1l1i1s1t1i1c1 1l1i1f1e1s1t1y1l1e1,1 1e1l1s1e1 1m1i1l2e1n2i1a1l1s1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1o1n1l1y1 1d1e1v1e1l1o1p1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1o1v1e1r1l1y1 1n1a1r1c1i1s2i1s1t1i1c1 1a1n1d1 1j1o1b1-1h1o1p2i1n1g1 1p1e1r1s1o1n1a1l1 1t1r1a1i1t1s1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1y1 1a1r1e1 1b1a1c1k1e1d1 1b1y1 1h1e1l1i1c1o1p1t1e1r1 1p1a1r1e1n1t1s1 1-1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1a1l2-1t1o2-1z1e1r1o1i1n1g1-1i1n1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1c1h1i1l1d1r1e1n1,1 1t1h1u1s1 1l1o2k1i1n1g1 1a1f1t1e1r1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1a1s1p1e1c1t1 1o1f1 1w1h1o1m1.1
2A1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1g1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1m1a1j1o1r1 1s1o1c1i1a1l1 1e1v1e1n1t1s1 1d1o1 1a1p2e1a1r1 1i1m1p1e1a1c1h1a1b1l1e1 1t1o1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1h1u1m1a1n1;1 1s1t1i1l2,1 1t1h1e1y1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1r1d1l1y1 1g1e1t1 1u1s1 1t1o1 1a1r2i1v1e1 1a1t1 1a1 1u1n1i1v1e1r1s1a1l1 1f1o1r1m1u1l1a1 1f1o1r1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1 1-1 1i1n1a1s1m1u1c1h1 1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1s1t1u1d1y1 1f1i1n1d1i1n1g1s1 2a1l1s1o1 1a1r2i1v1e1d1 1a1t1 1a1 1s1i1m1i1l1a1r1 1c1o1n1c1l1u1s1i1o1n1:1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1e1x1i1s1t1 1l1i1t2l1e1,1 1i1f1 1a1n1y1,1 1g1e1n1e1r1a1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1d1i1f2e1r1e1n1c1e1s1 1i1n1 1s1u1c1h1 1j1o1b1-1r1e1l1a1t1e1d1 1f1a1c1t1o1r1s1 1a1s1 1j1o1b1 1s1a1t1i1s1f1a1c1t1i1o1n1,1 1c1o1m2i1t1m1e1n1t1 1l1e1v1e1l1 1a1n1d1 1j1o1b1-1h1o1p2i1n1g1 1i1n1t1e1n1t1i1o1n1s1.1 1M1a1n1y1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1w1o1r1k1s1 1d1i1d1 1a1l1s1o1 1c1o1m1e1 1t1o1 1s1u1c1h1 1a1 1c1o1n1c1l1u1s1i1o1n1 1,1 1o1n1e1 1o1f1 1w1h1i1c1h1 1e1v1e1n1 1a1s2e1r1t1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1r1e1 1e1x1i1s1t1e1d1 1n1o1 1s1u1f2i1c1i1e1n1t1l1y1 1g1r1o1u1n1d1e1d1 1t1h1e1o1r1y1 1b1e1h1i1n1d1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1d1i1f2e1r1e1n1c1e1s1.1
2N1e1v1e1r1t1h1e1l1e1s2,1 1I1 1m1y1s1e1l1f1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1t1a1k1e1 1d1i1f2e1r1e1n1c1e1s1 1a1s1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1l1i1t2l1e1 1t1h1i1n1g1.1 1G1i1v1e1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1e1v1e1n1 1s1m1a1l2 1g1r1o1u1p1s1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1a1l2 1t1o2 1o1f1t1e1n1 1f1i1n1d1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1m1e1m1b1e1r1 1i1d1e1o1l1o1g1i1c1a1l2y1 1c1o1n1f1l1i1c1t1i1n1g1;1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1b1o1r1n1 1a1t1 1d1i1f2e1r1e1n1t1 1t1i1m1e1 1g1o1i1n1g1 1w1i1l1d1l1y1 1a1g1a1i1n1s1t1 1e1a1c1h1 1o1t1h1e1r1s1 1m1u1s1t1 1a1p2e1a1r1 1a1n1y1 1l1e1s2 1s1t1r1a1i1g1h1t1f1o1r1w1a1r1d1.1
2E1v1e1r1y1 1c1h1i1l1d1 1i1s1 1e1n1d1i1n1g1 1u1p1 1s1e1n1i1o1r1s1,1 1w1h1o1,1 1t1h1u1s1,1 1a1r1e1 1h1a1r1d1-1w1i1r1e1d1 1t1o1 1n1a1g2i1n1g1.1 1A1f1t1e1r1 1a1l2,1 1a1r1e1n1'1t1 1w1e1,1 1m1i1l2e1n2i1a1l1s1,1 1w1i1e1l1d1i1n1g1 1u1p1 1"1s1h1u1d2e1r1s1o1m1e1 1g1l1a1n1c1e1s1"1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1Z1 1g1e1n1s1?1
2W1h1i1l1s1t1 1b1o1x1i1n1g1 1o1u1r1s1e1l1v1e1s1 1i1n1 1a1 1v1i1c1i1o1u1s1 1c1i1r1c1l1e1,1 1w1h1e1r1e1i1n1 1w1e1 1a1r1e1 1t1u1r1n1i1n1g1 1n1o1s1e1 1u1p1 1a1t1 1a1n1y1 1o1t1h1e1r1s1.1 1T1u1c1k1e1d1 1a1w1a1y1 1i1n1 1o1u1r1 1v1e1r1y1 1p1e1r1c1e1p1t1i1o1n1 1i1s1 1t1h1e1 1v1e1r1y1 1p1r1e1c1o1n1c1e1p1t1i1o1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1o1t1h1e1r1s1 1a1r1e1 1d1o2m1e1d1 1m1e1a1g1r1e1 1a1n1d1 1w1o1e1f1u1l2y1 1b1e1l1o1w1 1p1a1r1,1 1y1e1t1 1h1e2d1l1e1s2 1t1h1a1t1 1w1e1 1a1r1e1 1a1c1t1u1a1l2y1 1p1e1r1c1e1i1v1e1d1 1a1s1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1d1e1s1p1e1r1a1t1e1 1"1o1t1h1e1r1s1"1 1t1o1 1o1t1h1e1r1s1.1
